pullRequest.title: [MSSQL] Support sp_execute and sp_unprepare
pullRequest.bodyText:
storage of the prepared statement handle
call sp_execute with handle when sp_prepexec has been invoked already
call sp_unprepare when statement is closed

This is needed to support batching properly

nodes.bodyText: You could use Netty IntObjectHashmap here.

beforeCommit.message:
Support sp_execute and sp_unprepare

Signed-off-by: Thomas Segismont <tsegismont@gmail.com>

commit.message:
Read prepared statement handle

This is the first step before supporting proper closing (sp_unprepare)

Signed-off-by: Thomas Segismont <tsegismont@gmail.com>

Support sp_execute and sp_unprepare

Signed-off-by: Thomas Segismont <tsegismont@gmail.com>
